main.name: Himmet GENCER
main.description: Hi, I am Himmet. I am a software developer
main.bio:
As a software developer, I specialize in designing desktop, control, embedded, IoT, and web applications for embedded and testing systems. 

I have particular expertise in the electronics and test systems fields, having developed notable applications such as automated test rigs, data acquisition systems, and electromechanical, servo-hydraulic control and test systems. Additionally, I have created web-based decision support systems for structural health monitoring center. 

Embedded Software Development(ADC, DAC, PGA, GPSDO, SPI, CAN, I2C, UART, RS485, TCP, UDP...) 

Software Development for Data Acquisition Systems

LabVIEW Developer

LabVIEW Trainer

NI PXI Systems, Real-Time OS, FPGA, TestStand

Knowledge of sensor technologies(Strain Gauge, Loadcell, Accelerometer, IMU, Tiltmeter, LVDT, Thermocouple, RTD, SSI, MDT, Pressure, Flowmeter, IEPE...)

Knowledge of motion controllers(MTS, Delta, Galil...)

Knowledge of Servo Hydraulic and Electromechanical Loading Systems (Hydraulic Actuators, Servo Valves, Servo Motors...) 

Test and Control Systems (Servo Hydraulic and Electromechanical Loading Systems, Universal Test Machines, Shaker, Shake Table...) 

Data Acquisition Systems(Analog Front-End, Gain-Amplifier, Anti-Aliasing Filter, Digital Signal Processing, Clock Distribution, GPS, PTP Synchronization) 

Structural Health Monitoring

Embedded Systems

Project Management

Specialties: 
-Embedded Software Development
-Project Management
-C,C++
-LabVIEW Programming
-MCU Programming
-Developing Electronics Projects
-Wireless Sensor Network
-Git
-Python
-Linux
-Docker
-C#, Asp.Net MVC
-HTML5, jQuery, Bootstrap,JavaScript, Node.js, RESTful, ReactJS, AngularJS, RabbitMQ
-SOLID
-Sql Server, Oracle, T SQL & PL SQL, MongoDB, InfluxDB
-Java
